section.title: Add your gpg key to KEYS
section.para:
In the root of the project there is a KEYS file. Add your key to this file and check it into source control. Depending on your tool of choice you can use on of the following commands:
pgp -kxa <your name> and append it to this file. (pgpk -ll <your name> && pgpk -xa <your name>) >> this file. (gpg --list-sigs <your name> && gpg --armor --export <your name>) >> this file.

section.title: Release steps
section.para:
Environment: Apache Maven 2.2.1 (r801777; 2009-08-06 15:16:01-0400) Java version: 1.6.0_17
Run mvn release:prepare, this will set all the right version numbers and create a tag in SVN. Run mvn release:perform, will upload the release to a staging area in the Apache Nexus Repository. Go into the juddi-dist, and run mvn clean install -Prelease Upload the signed distribution artifacts to apache people. Start a vote referencing the build artifacts, leave the vote open for 72 hrs.
On successful vote:
Release the staging artifacts in Nexus. Copy the distribution artifacts to the mirror. Update the website.
